short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to calculate TSS fudge factors, considering weight carried and vertical gain, in addition to hrTSS from Training Peaks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension applies the Evoke Endurance methodologies to adjust the hrTSS values from Training Peaks, considering vertical ascent and weight carried during the workout.
